org.monome.pages
Class MIDIKeyboardPage

java.lang.Object
  org.monome.pages.MIDIKeyboardPage
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, Page
public class MIDIKeyboardPage
extends java.lang.Object
implements Page, java.awt.event.ActionListener

The MIDI Faders page. Usage information is available at: http://code.google.com/p/monome-pages/wiki/MIDIKeyboardPage

Author:
Tom Dinchak

Field Summary

          The index of this page (the page number)
private  int[] keys
          The starting note for each key (from C-2 to B-2)

          The selected MIDI channel (8x8 only)

                     int velocity,

Plays a MIDI note. 0 velocity will send a note off, and > 0 velocity will send a note on.
